exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

original: intros n. induction n. - left. unfold is_prime. split. + discriminate. + intros d H. inversion H. - right. assert (H1 := Nat.eq_dec n 0). destruct H1. + subst. unfold is_prime. split. * discriminate. * intros d H. inversion H. + unfold is_prime. split. * intros contra. discriminate contra. * intros d H. right. inversion H. subst d. left. reflexivity.
